Package simulator

Class PEC

  • java.lang.Object
    • simulator.PEC
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventContainer

    public class PEC
extends java.lang.Object
implements EventContainer
    This class implements EventContainer, specifying criteria for sorting the Events and which is the next in line.

    In this PEC case, Events are ordered in ascending time order, using a PriorityQueue, providing a Comparator.

    See Also:
    PEC, EventComparatorByTime

    • Field Summary

      (package private) java.util.PriorityQueue<Event> events
